mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(foodId, businessId, userId, quantity) VALUES(#{foodId}, #{businessId}, #{userId}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE foodId = #{foodId} AND businessId = #{businessId} AND userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(c.quantity * f.foodPrice) FROM cart c JOIN food f ON c.foodId = f.foodId WHERE c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE userId = #{userId} AND businessId = #{businessId}
